snippet: LEVINE--Noel. The Board of Governors and members of Rockrimmon Country Club are profoundly saddened by the passing of their beloved friend and esteemed member for 28 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to all members of the Levine Family. Robert J. Bluestone, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. The Board of Governors and members of Rockrimmon Country Club are profoundly saddened by the passing of their beloved friend and esteemed member for 28 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to all members of the Levine Family. Robert J. Bluestone, President 1/3
